website_summaries.verdict: It might not be the most elaborate daybed around, but the simple design has its perks, and if you're starting from scratch, the foam mattress will come in handy.
pros: Thanks to a unique quick lock system, assembly couldn't be easier
Clean, basic lines make matching this daybed with existing furniture a breeze
Smaller dimensions are perfect for tight spaces, children's rooms, or used as a sofa
Metal frame is sturdy and the included foam mattress is surprisingly comfortable
cons: A handful of owners noted that the mattress has a faint smell which dissipates upon airing

customer_reviews.title: Incredible packaging, instructions and bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I assembled a lot of furniture. Never have I had seen a company with such commitment to offer a good experience and an excellent daybed. Every item is carefully secured and wrapped. Every step of the way is clearly explained and marked with number stickers. They even used aluminum stickers that won’t break or leave a glue residue. I assembled the bed alone in 15 minutes. I use it every night, thanks to a snoring husband. It’s very comfortable and for certain high quality. It doesn’t feel flimsy at all. I chose specifically that one because of the support legs in the middle, ensuring a better support. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!!
customer_reviews.text: These are strong ,sturdy and comfortable! Bought 3 beds (pictured )for small guest room. Wanted to be able to accommodate all my grandkids. And can put two beds next to each other for adults if needed.
customer_reviews.author: lu-lu

customer_reviews.title: I'm over 300lbs and it hasn't broken yet!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice daybed or place to take a short nap at work. Finding sheets for it is hell however and if you need this to look nice, save yourself the agony and just have some made. Otherwise the size you're going to be buying is "COT".
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kids small shared bedroom. More room to play!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my children’s small shared bedroom. Light weight enough to move around (vacuum under etc). Heavy duty enough that they stay put. I went with these so that they could have more place to play in their room. I’ve also considered painting them and/or slip covering the ends to give them a softer / girly look.
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: Quality, ease of instructions
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely so impressed with the quality of this day bed, packed so well and the instructions were great! Do not know how this company can make this product and with a gel mattress for this price. We neeed it in a bonus/guest room and have checked furniture stores in area, all day beds run $400 to $600 and mattress is seperate. Five stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: Loveing it
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed! But it's not comfortable. I recommend using mattress topper for extra plush. I don't have one since I bought a trifold a while back and fits snug which i like. I got this for my small sized room to alleviate space and floor room. I'm always at my gf's place so I'm rarely using it but it's very comfortable. You may need to buy those stoppers for the legs to keep it from shifting on the floor though. ( I should buy them soon) it's not that big of a deal though but some people are really bothered by a slight shift. You could wait on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up! I was able to do it in less than an hour by myself. I purchased this bed to use as a couch and spare bed in my tiny studio apartment, and it looks really nice. My two issues with it are the mattress is still stinking up my apartment a week later and the mattress is way firmer than I was expecting based on the reviews. Do not flop on this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Turner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Once I got the hang of it, putting it together was a piece of cake but unlike everyone else, I wasn’t very clear at first with the instructions, especially because first few steps was putting together 2 sides. Very good value
customer_reviews.author: Wunderkind

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, easy to assemble and sturdy. Mattress is more comfortable than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Cates

customer_reviews.title: Functional and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Assembled it myself, it’s been six months and it’s holding over great. The pas is comfortable but worth what is paid. I would recomend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a house guest. She loved sleeping on it. Easy to put together. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: this item is not going into a box. delivery truck took two men to deliver.
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a five inch mattress after 48 hours it has only risen to 4 inches. Wanting to return but mattress is not going back into its original state and frame took three hours to assemble. please advise as what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and affordable price.  You need this bed!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is very sturdy and the mattress is firm and sufficient for a good night's sleep or lounging in front of the TV. I'm sorry I did not find this when I started my tiny house build. I would order it again if I had a place for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith6090

customer_reviews.title: Please refund
customer_reviews.text: The mattress didn't inflate when I unpacked it. It is very weak. My back can feel the iron bed frame. I can't believe I have to pack it and send it to get the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Great bed for 6 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Does well as a childs bed or bed for company.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My grandson who is 9 enjoys it when he sleeps overnight.
customer_reviews.author: alice pualuan

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow. Definitely a guest bed or for a loft as a day bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalba Edith Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing easy to put together and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: laura hammonds

customer_reviews.title: No backboard
customer_reviews.text: I wish this product had a backboard, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ela

product_meta.title: Zinus Eli 30 Inch Wide Daybed Frame with Mattress Set
product_meta.description: Create comfortable seating and extra sleeping space for your family and guests with the Zinus Santa Fe 30 inch Daybed frame and foam mattress set. The solid steel and wood frame make it sturdy and durable. A box spring is not required. The Zinus Santa Fe 30 inch Daybed will work well in a guest room, den, or a small living space because of its compact size and extra storage space underneath. Functional and stylish, this Daybed will work with any style décor and add a comfortable touch to any room. Another comfort innovation from Zinus.
feature_bullets: 5 inch foam mattress includes Viscolatex and high density foam
Steel frame dimensions: 30" W x 77" L x 26” H (13” H to mattress base)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars43 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
